comments:
Description:
 The dataset property binding cann't work

Steps to reproduce:
 1. download the attached design file
 2. preview and input 'C%'/C%
 
Actual result:
  Throw an error
Error0 : odaconsumer.CannotSetStringParameter ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Cannot set the string value for parameter: 1Cannot set preparedStatement parameter string value.No input parameters. at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.PreparedStatement.doSetString(PreparedStatement.java:3653) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.PreparedStatement.setString(PreparedStatement.java:3331) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.PreparedStatement.setParameterValue(PreparedStatement.java:2735) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:125) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute(ReportExecutor.java:89) at Source)Caused by: org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.JDBCException: Cannot set preparedStatement parameter string value.No input parameters. at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.Statement.setString(Statement.java:526) at org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.oda.consumer.helper.OdaQuery.setString(OdaQuery.java:727) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.PreparedStatement.doSetString(PreparedStatement.java:3646) ... 57 moreCaused by: SQL Exception: No input parameters. at org.apache.derby.impl.jdbc.Util.generateCsSQLException(Util.java) at org.apache.derby.impl.jdbc.TransactionResourceImpl.wrapInSQLException(TransactionResourceImpl.java) at org.apache.derby.impl.jdbc.EmbedResultSet.noStateChangeException(EmbedResultSet.java) at org.apache.derby.impl.jdbc.EmbedPreparedStatement.setString(EmbedPreparedStatement.java) at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.Statement.setString(Statement.java:522)

You can refer the parameter binding problem with bug 122721. And in this case the value should be 'c%',not c%. Because in sql text, the accepted value of parameter should contains "''". So user should be careful when using the property binding.
